form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: AFFIDAVIT OF SUPPORT FOR IMMIGRATION VISA

full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/14/2023 In Re: CONSULATE GENERAL OF THE SAU GHAN CHAU, AFFIDAVIT OF SUPPORT CONSULAR SECTION OF AMERICA HONG KONG Applicant for Immigration Visa. NOV 17 1961 PM STATEOF CALIFORNIA ) AM ) SS: COUNTY OF VENTURA DONALD F. JUE and DONNA KUNG JUE, his wife, each for himself and not one for the other, being first duly sworn, depose and say: That affiants are citizens of the United States residing at 1780 Ventura Boulevard, Camarillo, California; 253 Dr Ventusa zi O.9.That affiant DONNA KUNG JUE filed a petition with the Immigra- tion and Naturalization Service for the issuance of an immigration visa to her mother, SAU GHAN CHAU; that such petition was approved by the Los Angeles office of the Immigration Service on May 9, 1960; That affiants were married on July 11 1947 at Canton. China and that they have four minor children, namely, FOIA (b)(6) and FOIA (b)(6) dependent upon them for support; That said SAU GHAN CHAU was born on January 29, 1910 at Fong Yung Lai, Hoiping District, Kwangtung Province, China and presently resides at 1-B Liberty Avenue, 1st F1., Kowloon, Hong Kong, B.C.C.; That affiants willingly assume the responsibility for the support and maintenance of said SAU GHAN CHAU, fully realizing the serious ob- ligation that they are assuming but are doing so in view of the love and affection that they have for said SAU GHAN CHAU; That affiant DONALD F. JUE has partnership interests in Bi Rite Markets, Saticoy, California valued at approximately $10,000.00 and in Ventura County Market, Santa Paula, California valued at approximately $5,000.00; that from these operations affiant has earned taxable income in the sum of $5353. 03; that attached hereto and made a part hereof, marked EXHIBIT A, is affiant's income tax return in verification thereof; That attached hereto and made a part hereof, marked EXHIBIT B, is a statement of Bank of America showing that affiants maintain savings account with a current balance of $5,957.23; That attached hereto and made a part hereof, marked EXHIBIT C, is a tax receipt showing that affiants real property in Ventura, California; that affiants' equity in said real property is worth approximately $7,000.00; That affiants personally promise and agree thatduring their life- time they will save the United States and all states, territories, counties
